price: 9. Knows he not that when the contents of the graves are poured forth (all mankind is resurrected)?
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
